snippet.title: Underboard: Omen Trailer
snippet.description:
A roguelike autobattler about people appearing in a dangerous place. Build a team of characters, equip them with items and aid them with spells to battle against monsters and meet their fate in the Underboard.

Try it free!
Newgrounds: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/880070
Itch: https://headless-games.itch.io/underboard-omen

While the game works by itself, it's only the prototype for our current project, named "Underboard". We're aiming to release it on Steam by the end of 2023.
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2376610/Underboard/
